website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, heavy-duty, and practical – the one to get if you need a world map that will hold up to frequent handling.
pros: An affordable and basic world map with durable laminated paper that's suitable for on or off wall use as well as use with dry erase markers
Sharp colors and details make it easy to read
cons: Rare reports of minor details missing from the map
If you need a large wall map, it's not likely fit your needs, but it's suitable for most users

customer_reviews.title: Center Piece of a Great Visual Aid
customer_reviews.text: It did a perfect job for me. I used it to indicate the countries from which we had people praying during a recent prison weekend. I ran a string line from each country where we had prayer originating, to 6" circles around the map on which I had listed the name of the originating country. It provided a vivid means of visualizing the world-wide coverage we had obtained without the inmates having to leave their chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best World Map
customer_reviews.text: I use this map in my classroom. The type font is easy to read; it is laminated so I can take it from classroom to classroom without it becoming damaged. It is a good size to use in the classroom and it really accurate for a flat map. It is made of good quality so I will be able to use it for years in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jean Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: OK but not good enough if you want to write on/ use with guests
customer_reviews.text: we used this in our wedding as a place where folks can put where they came from (we had countless of countries represented). The quality of this map when it came was really cheap as the paper was a bit ripped and then folks having to write on top said it was not so great. I am giving it 3 stars b/c originally it looks really cool if you write with a strong sharpee but after that, if you want to use anything else like markers or pens-- it didn't work well. It also bleeds to the other side. So get it if you want a simple map to hang in your place, but nothing else
customer_reviews.author: Yuri K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for homeschooling. High quality lamination on both sides. Well worth the money. I put it in our dining room near the table where we do our workbooks at. Thanks Amazon! 😊💕
customer_reviews.author: ❤JesusLives❤

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this flat world map for the 1st grader grandchildren. Perfect. The print can be small for some of the lesser tags, but using a magnifying glass is part of the lesson. Well made and once opened, it stays flat. High quality laminating on the plastic and white board markers come right off with a wipe. We're happy.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: World map
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my grand-daughter and one for myself. Laminated, good sized map with clear labeling. The only thing we didn't like was how tightly it was rolled up~made it really difficult to tack to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Nice map
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Put it in a frame and placed it low enough for the kids to color on the glass with dry erase for geography.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie Grissom

customer_reviews.title: he is very happy with the maps
customer_reviews.text: my step son from brazil was asking many question?? so i bought these 2 maps one of the world and one of the united states. we use a dry erase pen to make spots. makes learning more understandable . he is very happy with the maps . would recommend to a friend a for a training aid
customer_reviews.author: Robert Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Missing Important Parts Of  The World
customer_reviews.text: TWIMC, I purchased this map for teaching home school students. When I went looking for the island of MIDWAY, IT"S MISSING. Apparently the publishers failed to archive the correct scale, so the island's including MIDWAY weren't transferred. So much for a world map that covers only 95% of it
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value.
customer_reviews.text: This map is fantastic! I hung it with command strips and my little boy loves it. It’s great with dry erase markers, and Clorox wipes. The words are small.
customer_reviews.author: Dani McCulloch

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! this map is just perfect to have in you classroom or at home. Very detailed and the colors a vibrant and very good material. You would be happy with your purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Shellieann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This wall map is laminated with heavy duty laminate so it can undertake lots of wear. It is perfect for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Why

customer_reviews.title: Great map for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I pinned this to a wall in my hallway so I can pray over as many countries each day as time will allow.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Wastier

customer_reviews.title: Probably would not order this again.
customer_reviews.text: Received on 8-7-20 The map itself is nice. But the map was creased really bad as you can see in the picture. I have laid it out in direct SUNLIGHT to no avail. Even tried my blow dryer on it.. nothing works. I will just have to live with it I am sure. But buyer please beware in case it happens to you. 😄
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and durable
customer_reviews.text: Love the thickness and yet low weight. It's held on our wall by 4 small pieces of adhesive gum. It would take a lot of work to tear or damage this, and we used dry erase markers on it all the time with no problem. The one downside to this is the intensity of the shine. If there's any light bulb nearby, it reflects bad enough that it can't be seen very well on camera. This of course is probably only an issue for those who might be using it as a backdrop while skyping on laptop. Not enough of a problem to lose a star over for us though.
customer_reviews.author: Papadoc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: My husband has dementia and has difficulty remembering where counties are that are talked about in the news. He has it on the wall in his room and refers to it often. Very durable and easy to attach to the wall with sticky picture hangers. It comes rolled up tightly so I laid it out on the dinning room table with several heavy books on it for awhile and it stayed flat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, detailed map!
customer_reviews.text: I love this map! It's big and glossy and I love the colors. It hangs in my high school classroom and it's easy for all the kids to see even from across the room. Good value. Make sure you buy some super sticky double sided squares to hang it up- regular tape and sticky tack didn't work for me due to the glossy finish and the stiff paper.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in my kids room
customer_reviews.text: Glued it over a 24x36 steel sheet from the hardware store and used magnetic 'thumbtacks' for markers.
customer_reviews.author: Qaridaar

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful world map
customer_reviews.text: I have travelled many places around the world and I had been looking for a nice world map so I could put dots on the places I've been. I couldn't have asked for a better map than this one. It was the right size and had every country and most every cities and towns within them labelled.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Workman

customer_reviews.title: Really cool map. Bright colors and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Really cool map. Bright colors and easy to read. Our kids use it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: PerfectPair

customer_reviews.title: USPS should be disbanded.
customer_reviews.text: Fine for geography lessons. The USPS reported it as placed in mailbox, it was just chunked into the dirt by the road. Would have been 5 star if not for that. I used a staple gun to put staples in the outside border to mount it on the wall. All creases disappeared once pulled taught. Staple one side plumb, pull tight to the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep rolled up.
customer_reviews.text: My kids are forever asking wheee someplace is, and Google works but hard to see where it is in relation to where we are. Sine this is laminated I can keep it rolled up in the corner of the room and then pull it out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: MissyD35

customer_reviews.title: Good Map
customer_reviews.text: Great map. Definitely go laminated as it is better protected. We use ours to pin where we have gone in the world. I attached ours to an oak board and went from there. Durability I gave 4 stars, really 4.5, because it will crease easily if you're not careful in handling.
customer_reviews.author: WillsFam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homeschooling.
customer_reviews.text: Laminated, perfect size for homeschooling our 4th grader. Great bargain and high quality. Can't say enough. Perfect size and very good quality. It's hard to find a map within a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Blaine

customer_reviews.title: World Map - But don't write on it.
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son is obsessed with Countries and I decided to get him this Dry-Erase world map. After 1 month of use, the plastic on map started bubbling and now I have patches on the map with no plastic. He's used it anymore, so now he just looks at it. Very disappointing.. It's a pretty map, but a little too dark in colors for me and you can't use it to write on... I have another maps that are dry-erase and they are still going strong, but this one didn't last long. But if you want to buy it and frame it, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Baez

customer_reviews.title: Map
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for not getting 5 stars is that I thought I was ordering a puzzle of a map and it came as a poster and double checked what I order and it said a poster, I guess that is what I get for ordering at 2 in the morning and when it came daughter wanted to keep and hang it up, so we did!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous addition to my new "homeschool"
customer_reviews.text: This map is beautifully laminated and easy to read for my middle schooler. All of my younger children enjoy looking at the map and finding countries. I highly recommend this map for any parent who now finds themself teaching geography.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit hard to see USA 'state' lines and names. It is in a tight roll much smaller than the box. It had somehow been swished so that it has 'dents' when unrolled. It is a nice map. We are tacking it up for now until finding one to frame. This one is definately not frame quality. It will work for educational purposes and might even withstand a dry erase marker!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 11yr old's bedroom wall to compliment his school studies. You can draw on it with whiteboard markers. I used command strips to fasten it to the wall instead of pins. My son enjoys having this. The resolution is smooth not grainy and readable size font.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The first two locations I looked for were Guernsey Island and Tasmania. The Channel Islands weren’t on the map at all, and Tasmania was on the map but wasn’t labeled. So don’t look for a lot of detail on this map - which I assume is impacted by the size. However it is still a good buy in that it is sturdy and a manageable size for routine at home use.
customer_reviews.author: mary.e

customer_reviews.title: Great decor & learning tool
customer_reviews.text: I hung the laminated version in the kids playroom in a poster frame and it’s great. Some of the letters are small but nothing a magnifying glass won’t fix. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: ksmith

customer_reviews.title: A good overview of world geography.
customer_reviews.text: A good wall map. Serves the purpose of getting a good idea of world geography. Nothing fancy. Not so sure i would purchase as a gift but a practical item for my own use. Hangs on wall of home office.
customer_reviews.author: John Gronski

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great value and arrived in a timely manner. Well produced map.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthiav

customer_reviews.title: Great for Classrooms
customer_reviews.text: Took this to a school in Ethiopia. It's perfect. The fact that it is already laminated is wonderful. I was able to take it in my suitcase without it getting bent.
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: Just too small for me
customer_reviews.text: I ended up ordering a shower curtain with world map because there is so much to see that I couldn't on this map.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Family Map Project
customer_reviews.text: We framed this map and hung it on a wall. We added a legend assigning a color to each person, then correct color of a stick pin is used on the map to indicate countries where that person has traveled. Fun and educational for the grandkids!! Also, having a map easily accessible is a conversation starter that we enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Ranch Woman

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Costco had these for less. Other than the high price these are good quality and should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Beata

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a classroom! Laminated and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sized map and I bought it to put up in my classroom. We use it every week. It is laminated, sturdy and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jenstah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful World Map
customer_reviews.text: Nice map. Bought this for my brother who has some vision impairment. This is easy to see and bright and colorful, the words are distinctive. He will love it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great quick reference
customer_reviews.text: Great map. Good map to see where some small countries are and major cities around the world.
customer_reviews.author: tom franklin

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to see the world
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map so I could better follow world news. Great price and I am going to buy one for my grandson. The different colors help one see the country borders.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great map
customer_reviews.text: Good value for a map this big. Nicely laminated so you can use dry erase markers, if you want. Packaged well and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: j. thiele

customer_reviews.title: poor lamination
customer_reviews.text: The map itself is fine, but the lamination is/was cut too close to the paper and has already peeled within just a few weeks of receiving it. Womp womp.
customer_reviews.author: Just Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and lamination makes this a map that will hold up well during vacation bible school.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Corsica is colored as though part of Germany (should be France). There was another error I noticed that I'm forgetting. I did not check carefully for errors, just noticed errors at a cursory glance. Returned for a name brand map.
customer_reviews.author: ElleDee

customer_reviews.title: Daughters room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters room, I like that it’s laminated so it’s protected. Everything is labeled neatly. Can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Jean T

customer_reviews.title: very nice color combo
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy construction some of the small print is hard to read but overall very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy, its laminated and a great size. I got it to learn more about geography and for my kids to learn as well. Very detailed love it
customer_reviews.author: Marimba

customer_reviews.title: Great Map
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful map to see where countries are and the world news countries are easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Carol  B

customer_reviews.title: There is no DATE printed on the map.
customer_reviews.text: There is no DATE printed on the map, so you can only assume it is recent!
customer_reviews.author: barginhunter

customer_reviews.title: Precise glance of the world.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and great size to hang and glance to find various locations throughout the world.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel

customer_reviews.title: Really liked it....quality material and print
customer_reviews.text: It seems well built with good printing. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BillT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nicely laminated, bold colors
customer_reviews.text: The robust lamination will ensure this lasts for a long time. Nothing really more to add.

customer_reviews.title: World Map
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you purchase a frame with it because it rolls up. Great map though! :)

customer_reviews.title: Small printing
customer_reviews.text: Nice map but would make the printing fonts larger, probably at least 10 point

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came in gray tones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one that was a waste. This was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gross

customer_reviews.title: Durable and legible
customer_reviews.text: Great value. We taped it to a magnetic board and place magnets on it and mark it with whiteboard pens. It’s held up very well (been 3 months).

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive....can put on wall if placed in a frame.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special but good
customer_reviews.text: It's nicely laminated so it's durable in a kid's room

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and detailed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map to frame it and add map pins to place I've visited. Looks great, everyone likes it and some friends said they will do the same.

customer_reviews.title: A good quality and detailed educational wall map.
customer_reviews.text: A good educational quality laminated wall map that looks nice on my wall. Not flimsy at all but more of a durable quality and heavier weight than I originally thought it would be.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome map for my classroom!
customer_reviews.text: Completely blown away by this map for my kindergarten class! It was just the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Tomi Kaye Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good laminate job
customer_reviews.text: Very nice map, laminate job was well done. Happy with my purchase. Not a bot, btw. Werd.

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: This map is perfect for our home school room. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: jason frazier

customer_reviews.title: Map its self is great
customer_reviews.text: The map, color and labels are wonderful. The laminating is not great. It is all bubbled on the edges and I am concerned that it will pull apart. Good thing I am very close to retirement!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tpfef

customer_reviews.title: Excellent world map.
customer_reviews.text: Good laminated world map, that allows us to track all the countries that we have visited. Perfect size for us.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Poster
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the poster. My only regret is that I did not get the bigger one.

customer_reviews.title: Just the visual
customer_reviews.text: It's helping me teach my grandkids about the world and that there are people all around the world.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for a background for a video, but I know I can store it and use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kling

customer_reviews.title: Detailed yet clear
customer_reviews.text: The right amount of detail without getting too hard to read
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: A good up-to-date map
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my needs. The map is durable, reads easily, and is up to date (I believe). I’m collecting keychains and pinning them to the regions on the map from which they came.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: World Map
customer_reviews.text: Nice world map. A little smaller than what i needed but I like it

customer_reviews.title: Great map!
customer_reviews.text: Great map! We wanted it to track our Airbnb guests to see where they traveled from. We should have got a bigger map!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Education
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful during this time with distance learning. I have 5 granddaughters and 1 grandson and I’m happy to help with their education. 5 months -15yrs old I order a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Granny does it again 😆

customer_reviews.title: Decent Map for the price with color coding
customer_reviews.text: The Map is Good with proper color Coding for each country names
customer_reviews.author: Arul

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our deployment wall for our kids and it's great. They are able to see where dad is and have a visualization of how far he is. Plus it came laminated which is awesome. We will be able to use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Travel the world
customer_reviews.text: My brother travels a lot and this map shows me “Where in the world is Richard’s”.
customer_reviews.author: tonka

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Loved the way it shipped
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Loved the way it shipped. Great quality I use it in my at home classroom. Durable and loved the laminate.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: It is laminated.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my kids as they have been asking me some question on geography. They loved it. Since this map is laminated it is easy to stick on wall. It also increases durability.
customer_reviews.author: Shoaib P.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, Beautiful Map.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see the outlines of all fifty states as well as the countries. Disappointed not to have the states outlined and labeled.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality poster. Great information, perfect for my kids room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this map
customer_reviews.text: was perfect for my needs and is good quality. great for the price too. if you're interested in knowing where different countries are, you can't do better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly laminated and durable. Small map so challenging to find places at times, but it is exactly what I needed for my classroom!

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT QUALITY PRODUCT. I WOULD PURCHSE FROM THIS MERCHANT AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Hard working mom, not alot of time!

customer_reviews.title: Great world map
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year old grandson loves it. Very legible and good quality. Package arrived in tact.

customer_reviews.title: cant hanhg on the wall countried looks small
customer_reviews.text: Its good if you are looking while placed on a table but not hanging on the wall cant see writing.

customer_reviews.title: Great world map
customer_reviews.text: Contained a lot of information and up to date. Capitols hard to distinguish in some areas.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This map was too heavy for my office cubicle. Just would not stay on my cubicle wall no matter how many tacks I used. Disappointed as it is a nice, glossy, detailed map.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It’s ‘OK’.
customer_reviews.text: It’s 'OK'. It was rolled but there are creases/folds in it. Not as thick as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect size ..now i can put little pin everywhere i go

customer_reviews.title: NO MERCHANDISE
customer_reviews.text: The box came sealed and when it was open just brown paper was in the box - no merchandise

customer_reviews.title: World Maps: Handy Reference
customer_reviews.text: The World Maps were just what we were looking for so our student! We needed an up-to-date reference that we could post for quick student access and this item works. It was a welcome addition to our charts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This actually went to the neighbors I just got it today it is exactly what I wanted.

customer_reviews.text: Nice big map, easy to read and mark as needed.

customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Well worth the price. Looks fabulous in a frame.

customer_reviews.title: land/sea
customer_reviews.text: some countries were colored similarly to oceans, making it difficult to distinguish them....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You realize what you sow
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what we asked for, the kids love it.

customer_reviews.title: awesome map
customer_reviews.text: love the, had it mounted on core board to hang up easily and not have tears or corner roll up issues.
customer_reviews.author: moira dunn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Recently got my Ancestry DNA results back. Could not wait to find a map big enough to see the locations my ancestors roamed. My vision is not the best, but I can read this clearly. I can physically see where I came from. The paths, I'm from everywhere! Framed it with poster board frame so I can push pin my ancestors locations. It's laminated so double-sided tape did not work for me. I forced the plastic frame over both the laminated map and cardboard backer. Black taped the frame from behind to the cardboard so it wouldn't fall apart. Yet it's not heavy and easy to handle. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CemeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: very suitable for the classroom. I love my world map.
customer_reviews.author: Ismary Herrera

product_meta.title: 24x36 World Classic Elite Wall Map Mural Poster Laminated
product_meta.description: 24x36 World Wall Map Classic Elite Series Poster: This elegant, richly colored classic-style World Elite Series map features the incredible cartographic detail that Swiftmaps.com has been known for. The World Classic Elite features a Miller Projection, which reduces distortion of land masses as they near the poles. Laminated on both sides for dry-erse markers and years of durability! Only the best from Swiftmaps.com line of quality wall maps!!
feature_bullets: Poster size world wall at 24x36 inches
Rolled World Wall Map - not folded
Lamination on both sides for dry/wet erase markers + durability
Perfect World Map Poster for office, home or school
Up-to-date and current world wall map poster
